name: Disability Rights Education and Defense Fund, Inc. (DREDF)
short_desc: Legal support, advocacy and referrals for disabled persons
description: Offers information, referral, advocacy, legal representation, and policy analysis on civil rights issues and disability. Also offers technical assistance to disability rights attorneys on Titles II and III of the Americans with Disabilities Act. Provides information to parents and caregivers of children with disabilities regarding their children's rights in the educational process.
